title: 834 27th Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Arbutus with very large canker, nearly 50 percent trunk bark missing and likely close to 50 percent dead wood in trunk, vertical crack, over 5 ft tall; replaceable in set back

title: 1868 Greenwich Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787727); significant tree within footprint of planned new building construction and cannot be preserved, species does not tolerate root pruning and excavation; property owner to pay in-lieu fee for loss of permanent site

title: 1240 Lombard Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787860); tree has outgrown space and is damaging property and foundation; replacement not suitable and therefore not required

title: 3126 Clay Street
Reason(s) for removal: Precious branch failure, a vehicle accident has seen the tree lose two of its three remaining main stems, remaining stem is attached with included bark and is structurally unsound, no protection from prevailing wind; not replaceable due to proximity to street light

title: 2300 Mason Street
Reason(s) for removal: Will be wind exposed when tree 4 is removed, has no taper, low live crown ratio, codomimant stems, no laterals to reduce to fix structure due to tall spindly form; will be replaced

title: 2300 Mason Street
Reason(s) for removal: Old decay and heavy end weight, poor union, old wound wood in old crack, could fail at any moment; can be replaced once basin is shifted away from underground gas line

title: 900X Van Ness Avenue (in median)
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction of Van Ness BRT project (787880); median to be reduced for BRT project, trees will be destabilized by root cutting, excavation will occur with 2.5' from trunk on both sides of trees, bus pad cannot be reduced; will be replaced with Corymbia Citriodora

title: 1453 McAllister Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787796); significant canopy decline, much smaller and less vigorous than neighboring tree of same species and age; property owner to remove and replace

title: 160 Miraloma Drive
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787859); tree is growing right up againt house and rennovations to aging foundation cannot occur without destablizing the tree; may be replaced, inspector still working with property owner

title: 702 Foerster Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (786655); foundational damage to be repaired will destabilize tree, tree growing into home structure (roof), owner has flooding due to gaps in foundation where underground creek is eroding home and redwood has tapped into this water source; property owner to remove and replace

title: 271 Upper Terrace
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction of new building

title: 303 Upper Terrace
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction of new building

title: 4500 17th Street
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction of new building (785313); will be replaced, additionally new trees will be planted to maximum capacity given site constraints of utilities, driveways, streetlights etc. around new parcels and buildings

title: 7 Heyman Street
Reason(s) for removal: All residents on block contacted BUF to discuss tree removal, four of six ficus on block were approved for removal due to poor structure (codominant leaders, included bark); residents have committed to help watering reaplcement trees

title: 11 Heyman Street
Reason(s) for removal: All residents on block contacted BUF to discuss tree removal, four of six ficus on block were approved for removal due to poor structure (codominant leaders, included bark); residents have committed to help watering reaplcement trees

title: 1919 Palou Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Permit removal for construction of Palou Streetscape Project (787858); in decline; will be replaced

title: 1400 Palou Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Permit removal for construction of Palou Streetscape Project (787858); in very poor condition; will be replaced

title: 401 Orizaba Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: In very poor condition, growing too close to home, pushing against home, leaning over sidewalk obstructing pedestrian traffic, and roots are uplifting driveway; not replaceable due to proximity to existing infrastructure (house foundation and driveway)
